select * , count(said) svCount from ( select T1.serviceId, T1.service_name, T1.circle, T1.city, T1.hotspot, T1.service, T1.serviceMode ,T1.scheduleStart, T1.scheduleStop, T1.national_yn, T1.emergency_yn, T1.said ,d.mode, c.countUC, c.countBC, c.insertDate from ( select *, (select circle_name as name from circle where circle_id IN (said)) circle , (select city_name as name from city where city_id IN (said)) city , (select hotspot_name as name from hotspot where hotspot_id IN (said)) hotspot from ( select serviceId, service_name, service, serviceMode , SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(said, ',', n.n), ',', -1) as said , schedule_start scheduleStart, schedule_stop scheduleStop , national_yn, emergency_yn from (select b.*, s.national_yn, s.emergency_yn FROM broadcast_info b INNER JOIN schedule s ON b.BCID = s.BCID WHERE s.del_yn = 'N') t CROSS JOIN ( SELECT a.N + b.N * 10 + 1 n FROM (SELECT 0 AS N UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) a ,(SELECT 0 AS N UNION ALL SELECT 1 UNION ALL SELECT 2 UNION ALL SELECT 3 UNION ALL SELECT 4 UNION ALL SELECT 5 UNION ALL SELECT 6 UNION ALL SELECT 7 UNION ALL SELECT 8 UNION ALL SELECT 9) b ORDER BY n ) n WHERE n.n <= 1 + (LENGTH(said) - LENGTH(REPLACE(said, ',', ''))) order by BCID desc ) T1 ) T1 inner join mood_request c on T1.said = c.said and T1.serviceId = c.serviceId inner join mood_service d on c.saId = d.said and c.serviceId = d.serviceId order by c.insertDate desc ) T2 WHERE 1=1

AND said IN (${circleListStr})
AND said IN (${cityListStr})
AND said IN (${hotspotListStr})

group by serviceId limit #{start}, #{end}
